name: Recommendarr
short_desc: AI-powered TV and movie recommendations based on your library
author: fingerthief
description: Recommendarr is a web application that generates personalized TV show and movie recommendations based on your Sonarr, Radarr, Plex, Jellyfin, Tautulli, and Trakt libraries using AI. It integrates with OpenAI, local models (Ollama/LM Studio), or any OpenAI-compatible API to provide intelligent recommendations tailored to your preferences.
